message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its advanced features and unparalleled quality, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I propose a price of $20000 for this remarkable item. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and lifetime support to ensure your complete satisfaction. I believe this is a fair and competitive price considering the product's high standards and benefits. Let's discuss how we can bring this innovative solution into your world.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $15000 or less. I would like to make a counteroffer at $16000 if possible.
